text: Under any circumstance, simply do your best, and you will avoid self-judgment, self-abuse and regret.
author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

text: The best way to say, 'I love you, God,' is to live your life doing your best. The best way to say, 'Thank you, God,' is by letting go of the past and living in the present moment, right here and now.
author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

text: Attention is the ability we have to discriminate and to focus only on that which we want to perceive.
author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

text: You can choose to follow your heart always.
author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

text: Love is unknown. To open the heart in trust is unknown. They say love hurts. It doesn't have to.
author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

text: Forgive yourself. The supreme act of forgiveness is when you can forgive yourself for all the wounds you've created in your own life. Forgiveness is an act of self-love. When you forgive yourself, self-acceptance begins and self-love grows.
author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

text: The only reason you are happy is because you choose to be happy. Happiness is a choice, and so is suffering.
author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

text: We make the assumption that everyone sees life the way we do.
author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

text: When we believe in lies, we cannot see the truth, so we make thousands of assumptions and we take them as truth.
author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

text: We make all sorts of assumptions because we don't have the courage to ask questions.
author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

text: Relationship is an art. The dream that two people create is more difficult to master than one.
author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

text: Always Do Your Best. Your best is going to change from moment to moment; it will be different when you are healthy as opposed to sick. Under any circumstance, simply do your best, and you will avoid self-judgment, self-abuse and regret.
author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

text: The dream of life is really an illusion, and everybody lives in the reality he or she creates - a virtual reality that is only true for the one who creates it.
author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

text: Respect is one of the greatest expressions of love.
author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

text: There is nothing to do except to be just who you are. You have the right to feel beautiful and enjoy it.
author: Miguel Angel Ruiz
